author: rdonkin
msg: Update release notes with fix made

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1824, CAMEL-1825: implemented retry logic when deleting processed files and using exists check to work around issue on some OS. Fixed issue with maxMessagePerPoll. Thanks to Alexander Lee for the findings.

author: clement
msg: Handlers are now selected by ignoring the case of the name and the namespace. Moreover, the HandlerDescription selection follows the same rule.

author: hansbak
msg: added the possbility that in a configurable product a subassembly is included with a BOM definition which need to be assembled fist, demo data to demonstrate this is included for the famous PC001
